channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US Heat Wave: Latest Forecast for the East Coast
item.description: This week is delivering the hottest temperatures of the year so far to much of the eastern United States.

item.title: The $8 billion Al Udeid Air Base that Iran attacked was once so secretive that U.S. military officers would only say it was somewhere ‘in southwest Asia’

item.title: 2 million people could have their salaries garnished by the government this summer over student loans
Jason Isaacs earned millions from starring roles in ‘Harry Potter’ and ‘The White Lotus’—but he says he has ‘pretty much spent’ it all
item.description: The British actor has an estimated net worth of $6 million, earning about $40,000 per episode starring in "The White Lotus," but he's spent much of it...

item.title: At Justice Dept., Bove Suggested Violating Court Orders, Whistle-Blower Says
item.description: Emil Bove III, a Trump judicial nominee, voiced his intent to disobey court orders as others stonewalled and misled judges, according to a complaint.

item.title: Solana treasury firm Upexi falls 62% after insider sales filing
item.description: Upexi is one of a slew of publicly traded firms that have stockpiled cryptocurrencies to boost their share prices.

item.title: I run a $145 billion U.S. energy company. Investing in infrastructure and putting America first shouldn’t divide us
item.description: The debate over clean energy tax credits must transcend renewable energy—because much more is at stake.

item.title: Israel and Iran deny violating a nascent truce, offering their own versions of events.

item.description: Mish and Lucy, 5-year-old siblings, escaped their enclosure at a wildlife sanctuary in Devon, England. Only honey was in danger.
